comments:
I20061121-1845

In the compare editor I did a 'Copy Current Change from Right to Left' then a save (Ctrl-S) resulting in an AME. Workaround is to open the file in the Java Editor, open it in the compare editor, copy right to left, close compare editor without saving, save the java editor.

This type of error usually only happens when you are self hosting on plug-ins from HEAD. Is this the case (i.e. there were changes in Compare that require changes in Team)? I would ask that you upgrade to the latest integration build and reopen if you still get the error.
